subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Jason Kendall, the Athletics' catcher, charged the mound and wrestled with John Lackey, the Angels' pitcher, spicing up Oakland's 10-3 victory over Los Angeles.
snippet: Jason Kendall, the Athletics' catcher, charged the mound and wrestled with John Lackey, the Angels' pitcher, spicing up Oakland's 10-3 victory over Los Angeles.
